Title: Ritual & Repetition
Writer: Jeremy Slater (created by), William Peter Blatty (inspired by the novel by), Sean Crouch, David Grimm (story editor)
Actors: Alfonso Herrera, Ben Daniels, Zuleikha Robinson, Kurt Egyiawan
Plot: The demon has plans for everyone on the island when Tomas faces it in a desperate battle while Marcus and Rose try to evacuate the foster children.
